thread.title: Jay-Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC

author: DEEPTI HAJELA, Associated Press
title: Jay-Z, Beyonce, others perform at Tidal concert in NYC
text: Balmain H&M collaboration draws Kendall Jenner, Gigi Hadid Alicia Rancilio, Associated Press Updated 2:11 am, Wednesday, October 21, 2015 Photo: Andy Kropa, Andy Kropa/Invision/AP Image 1 of / 8 Close Image 1 of 8 Gigi Hadid attends the Balmain x H&M Collection launch event at 23 Wall Street on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in New York. (Photo by Andy Kropa/Invision/AP) Gigi Hadid attends the Balmain x H&M Collection launch event at 23 Wall Street on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in New York. (Photo by Andy Kropa/Invision/AP) Kendall Jenner attends the Balmain x H&M Collection launch event at 23 Wall Street on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in New York. (Photo by Andy Kropa/Invision/AP) Photo: Andy Kropa, Andy Kropa/Invision/AP Image 8 of 8 Balmain H&M collaboration draws Kendall Jenner, Gigi Hadid 1 / 8 Back to Gallery NEW YORK (AP) â€” An event Tuesday in New York to launch the new Balmain x H&M collection turned the typical runway show up about 10 notches to a full-on party. A video intro featuring Kendall Jenner riding a futuristic subway with dancers vogueing kicked off the runway show. Models showing the collection featured Jenner again along with Gigi and Bella Hadid , Karlie Kloss and Jourdan Dunn . "I think the models I chose are my friends," said Balmain creative director Olivier Rousteing . "All the girls that I love that can grab my hand and just say, 'Don't worry, It's gonna be fun.' It's a night of love and of friendship and of fun." Clothing ranged from beaded jackets, draped trousers and genie pants. At the end of the runway portion of the presentation, the Backstreet Boys performed a medley of some of their hits. The Balmain x H&M line is intended to be more affordable but that's depending on whom you ask, with some pieces priced at more than $500. The collection goes on sale Nov. 5. ___ Follow Alicia Rancilio at http://www.twitter.com/aliciar ___
